ygData.subject: RE: battle drum (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Mynthi Davissi, a named gypsy musician in the ballroom of Mistmoore Castle. I believe the lute of the gypsy princess is her common drop and the mm battle drum
ygData.messageBody:
Mynthi Davissi, a named gypsy musician in the ballroom of Mistmoore Castle.
I believe the lute of the gypsy princess is her common drop and the mm
battle drum is her rare drop. the lute is for a quest to get a lambent
breastplate (after today's patch that is).

i believe anywhere in the 500 to 1000pp range to buy one.

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 14 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> Ok who and where is the person I have to kill to get the
> battle drum? and
> also if I find one for trade what is the price I should pay?
